p: Consequently, the aim of this study was to determine the anti- Acanthamoeba activity of Cambodian medicinal plants, including A. muricata and C. trifoliatum against the trophozoites and cysts of A. triangularis. Effects of A. muricata and C. trifoliatum extracts on the adhesion of the amoeba to plastic polystyrene was determined. Importantly, synergistic effects of the plant extract in combination with antibiotic was investigated.
